Test Name: PAIN CLINIC SURVEY 10, CHAIN OF CUSTODY, RANDOM, URINE
Purpose: To analyze urine specimens under chain-of-custody controls to obtain accurate and reliable drug test results for Pain Clinic Survey 10.
Equipment: Urine drug test kits/reagent strips; gas chromatography-mass spectrometry (GC-MS) or liquid chromatography-mass spectrometry (LC-MS) instruments
